scripts.postinstall: cd travel_mcp && npm install && cd ../excellere_mcp && npm install
scripts.start: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const app = process.env.APP_TYPE === 'excellere' ? 'excellere_mcp' : 'travel_mcp'; execSync('cd ' + app + ' && node index.js', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.install:voyage: cd travel_mcp && npm install && cd ../travel_ui && npm install
scripts.install:excellere: cd excellere_mcp && npm install && cd ../excellere_ui && npm install
